titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd to the natives of the county of Dorset, residing in and about the cities of London and Westminster, at St. Mary Le Bowe, on Dec. 8, 1692, being the day of their anniversary feast by the Lord Bishop of Rochester.
titleStmt.author: Sprat, Thomas, 1635-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Savoy, printed by Edward Jones and sold by him and Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Thomas Sprat. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
